structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Plymouth County; Issuance Of Writs Of Venire Facias For Grand Jurors
law.text: The clerk of the court for Plymouth County shall, not less than twenty-eight days before the first Mondays of January and May, and the second Monday of September respectively, issue writs of venire facias for forty-five veniremen from whom the court shall select twenty-three grand jurors to serve in said court, who shall serve for each sitting thereof for four months and until another grand jury has been impanelled in their stead.
